item.title: Thermal Runaway error on Creality Ender 3 Neo
item.description: Just before Christmas, I purchased a Creality Ender 3 Neo (v1) printer on discount. Up to now, I’ve been working with a Monoprice Select Mini Pro (purchased at the start of the pandemic so I could work on 3D modeling projects at home…). That never really took off… partly because the Monoprice machine was soooo difficult to work with that larger prints were impossible. In addition, the bed size on the machine was 6" x 6", pretty small for a lot of projects.
